title: Paper accepted to ACM CHI 2024
summary: Our latest work on AI-mediated communication was accepted at ACM CHI 2024. Looking forward to presenting the findings in Honolulu.

title: Joining DxD Lab as incoming Ph.D. student
summary: I am excited to share that I will be joining the DxD Lab at KAIST as an incoming Ph.D. student under the supervision of Prof. Hwajung Hong.

title: Received Outstanding Research Award
summary: Honored to receive the Outstanding Research Award for my undergraduate thesis on AI accessibility for marginalized communities.
